intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Imitation Crab and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Imitation crab may contain gluten due to the presence of surimi and added flavorings or fillers that can include wheat. It's important to check labels and inquire about specific brands and preparation methods.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.
